title: U.S. household expenditure on slipcovers and decorative pillows 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 5.01 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars about 2.93 was reached at Year 2008
